text:
Marco Jaggi (born January 12, 1980) is a Swiss professional wrestler and wrestling trainer. He is known by his ring name Ares (or Are$). He was born in Bienne, Switzerland.
For much of his career, Jaggi teamed with Claudio Castagnoli and Marc Roudin as part of Swiss Money Holding. They were one of the top tag teams in Europe during the 2000s, the trio won titles in Germany, France, the United Kingdom and their native Switzerland.
Under the Freebird Rule, Jaggi held the IPW:UK Tag Team Championship with Castagnoli and Roudin for a record 12 months.
In 2008, he married wrestler Allison Danger. They have one daughter.
